name: UNiagaraDataInterfaceRigidMeshCollisionQuery
doc: Data Interface used to collide against static meshes - whether it is the mesh distance field or a physics asset's collision primitive

ActorTags:
Set of tags used to match against actors when searching for RigidBody providers.  Empty tags will be ignored, and only a single
              tag is required for an actor to be matched.
ComponentTags:
Set of tags used to match against components when searching for RigidBody providers.  Empty tags will be ignored, and only a
              single tag is required for a component to be matched.
SourceActors: Hardcoded references to actors that will be used as RigidBody providers.
OnlyUseMoveable: If enabled only actors that are considered moveable will be searched for RigidBodies.
UseComplexCollisions: If enabled, complex collisions will be searched for.
bFilterByObjectType: If enabled, FindActors will use filtering based on ObjectType instead of Channel.
MaxNumPrimitives: Maximum number of RigidBody represented by this DataInterface.
